name: Parsleyed Baby Carrots
keywords: carrot, parsley, gluten-free, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish
recipeIngredient: 2 tablespoons finely chopped parsley or coriander

recipeInstructions.text: Peel carrots and leave some green leaves. Place them in a small saucepan and add water to cover and salt. Simmer 8 minutes or until tender. Drain.
Melt butter in the same saucepan and add carrots, lemon juice, cumin, salt, pepper and parsley. Toss and blend well.
